nodes.documentation:
transfer profits to staking pool to be ditributed to stakers.
 @dev transfer profits since last compound to the staking pool while taking out necessary fees.

withdraws the total bankroll in case of emergency.
 @dev drains the total bankroll and sets the state variable `totalBankroll` to 0

attributes.documentation:
withdraws the total bankroll in case of emergency.
 @dev drains the total bankroll and sets the state variable `totalBankroll` to 0
attributes.name: EmergencyWithdrawBankroll
setBitcrushStaking

EmergencyWithdrawBankroll().details: drains the total bankroll and sets the state variable `totalBankroll` to 0

addUserLoss(uint256).details: adds funds to the bankroll if bankroll is in positive, otherwise its transfered to the staking pool to recover frozen funds

authorizeAddress(address).details: updates the authorizedAddresses mapping to true for given address

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

payOutUserWinning(uint256,address).details: deducts funds from the bankroll if bankroll is in positive, otherwise theyre pulled from staking pool and bankroll marked as negative

removeAuthorization(address).details: updates the authorizedAddresses mapping by deleting entry for given address

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner.     * NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

setBitcrushStaking(address).details: stores the _stakingPool address in the state variable `stakingPool`

setHouseBankrollShare(uint256).details: stores the _houseBankrollShare address in the state variable `houseBankrollShare`

setLiveWallet(address).details: stores the _liveWallet address in the state variable `liveWallet`

setLotteryShare(uint256).details: stores the _lotteryShare address in the state variable `lotteryShare`

setProfitShare(uint256).details: stores the _profitShare address in the state variable `profitShare`

setProfitThreshold(uint256).details: stores the _threshold address in the state variable `profitThreshold`

setReserveShare(uint256).details: stores the _reserveShare address in the state variable `reserveShare`

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

transferProfit().details: transfer profits since last compound to the staking pool while taking out necessary fees.

EmergencyWithdrawBankroll().notice: withdraws the total bankroll in case of emergency.

addUserLoss(uint256).notice: Add users loss to the bankroll

authorizeAddress(address).notice: authorize address to register wins and losses

payOutUserWinning(uint256,address).notice: Deduct users win from the bankroll

removeAuthorization(address).notice: remove authorization of an address from register wins and losses

transferProfit().notice: transfer profits to staking pool to be ditributed to stakers.
